name: One (itch) (Ghina Al Halabi)
description:
This game is a casual game that describes empathy. It's a game where characters have some emotions, and the player needs to empathize with them by matching the same emotion.

How to play:
Each character on the platform has a symbol circulating around it. That symbolizes its emotion.
Find the same emotion on the bar below, press on it, and merge it with the character.

Merging the wrong emotions together will cause you to lose a heart.
3 hearts, and the game is over.

Merge them quickly because the characters will get angry over time and leave.

Link to the game: justguni.itch.io/one
